Winter's Clutch.name: Winter's Clutch
Winter's Clutch.fullText:
Blizzard Mage Attack 11Winter's Clutch

Your hand is coated in frost as you sweep it in front of you, encasing nearby creatures in chilling wind and sheets of ice.

Encounter        Arcane, Cold, Implement
Standard Action      Ranged 20

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage. You slide the target 1 square, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. Also, you slide each ally within 20 squares of you 2 squares.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 42.
Winter's Clutch.flavor: Your hand is coated in frost as you sweep it in front of you, encasing nearby creatures in chilling wind and sheets of ice.

Cloak of Freezing Wind.name: Cloak of Freezing Wind
Cloak of Freezing Wind.fullText:
Blizzard Mage Utility 12Cloak of Freezing Wind

The icy chill of winter surrounds you as cold, whipping wind protects you from attacks.

Daily        Arcane, Cold
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, each creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 1d8 + your Charisma modifier cold damage, and you push that creature 1d4 + 2 squares.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 42.
Cloak of Freezing Wind.flavor: The icy chill of winter surrounds you as cold, whipping wind protects you from attacks.
Cloak of Freezing Wind.range:
Personal

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.fullText:
Blizzard Mage Attack 20Blizzard

A chaotic swirl bursts out from you, buffeting everyone nearby with wind and ice.

Daily        Arcane, Cold, Implement
Standard Action      Close burst 10

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and you knock the target prone.

Effect: Each ally in the burst gains resist 10 cold until the end of the encounter.
Until the end of the encounter, you are surrounded by freezing wind and snow. At the start of each of your turns, each enemy within 10 squares of you takes 2d6 cold damage, and you slide it 2 squares.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 42.
